text: Indiana State University (ISU) is a university in the U.S. state of Indiana. It is in Terre Haute, Indiana. ISU's sports teams, known as Sycamores, play mostly in the Missouri Valley Conference. The Sycamores football team plays in the separate but related Missouri Valley Football Conference. The school is perhaps best known as the alma mater of basketball player Larry Bird. ==References== Category:Colleges and universities in Indiana Category:1865 establishments in the United States Category:Missouri Valley Conference Category:Missouri Valley Football Conference Category:19th-century establishments in Indiana
title: Indiana State University
